welcome_message_body: "Welcome to West Pensacola, a charming city known for its beautiful beaches, delicious seafood, and friendly locals. We're thrilled to have you here and invite you to explore all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pensacola NAS Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Pensacola NAS Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pensacola International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is used for domestic flights operated by American Airlines and Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is used for domestic flights operated by United Airlines and Southwest Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Edwards Airport, where all commercial flights arrive and depart.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private flights and charter services at Edwards Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
